name: Select Operators
content:
// Arithmetic Operators

1 + 1 - 1 * 1 / 1 = x % 2;
x++; x--;

// Assignment Operators

x = y
x += y
x -= y
x *= y
x /= y
x %= y

Bitwise Operators

x = 5 & 1
x = 5 | 1
x = ~ 5	
x = 5 ^ 1
x = 5 << 1
x = 5 >> 1

Comparison Operators

(x == y)
(x === y)
(x != y)
(x !== y)
(x > y)
(x < y)
(x >= y)
(x <= y)

Logical Operators

(foo && bar)
(foo || bar)
(!foo)

Conditional Operator

x = (condition) ? value1 : value2;
author: luisreyes.com
